fields.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Bowl
fields.description: Grilled chicken breast over crisp romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

fields.name: Buffalo Chicken Quinoa Bowl
fields.description: Spicy buffalo chicken, quinoa, black beans, corn, and avocado with a creamy ranch dressing.

fields.name: Lemon Herb Chicken and Vegetable Rice Bowl
fields.description: Lemon herb-marinated chicken with roasted vegetables and jasmine rice, topped with a light lemon vinaigrette.

fields.name: Thai Peanut Chicken Noodle Bowl
fields.description: Shredded chicken, rice noodles, bell peppers, and snap peas in a Thai-inspired peanut sauce.

fields.name: Grilled Salmon and Avocado Quinoa Bowl
fields.description: Grilled salmon on a bed of quinoa, avocado, cucumber, and a citrusy dill dressing.

fields.name: Mango Salsa Tuna Bowl
fields.description: Light tuna, mango salsa, black beans, and brown rice with a hint of lime.

fields.name: Coconut Shrimp and Pineapple Bowl
fields.description: Crispy coconut shrimp, pineapple chunks, and steamed broccoli over coconut rice.

fields.name: Teriyaki Glazed Mahi-Mahi Bowl
fields.description: Mahi-mahi fillet glazed with teriyaki sauce, served with stir-fried bok choy and brown rice.

fields.name: Mushroom and Spinach Pesto Quinoa Bowl
fields.description: Sautéed mushrooms and spinach with quinoa, cherry tomatoes, and a basil pesto drizzle.

fields.name: Chickpea and Sweet Potato Buddha Bowl
fields.description: Roasted chickpeas, sweet potato cubes, kale, and tahini dressing over a bed of quinoa.

fields.name: Eggplant and Tomato Caprese Bowl
fields.description: Grilled eggplant, cherry tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and balsamic glaze over couscous.

fields.name: Mexican Street Corn Salad Bowl
fields.description: Corn salad with black beans, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a lime-cilantro dressing.

fields.name: Korean BBQ Beef Bibimbap Bowl
fields.description: Korean marinated beef, pickled vegetables, and a fried egg over a bed of rice.

fields.name: Beef and Broccoli Brown Rice Bowl
fields.description: Tender beef slices with broccoli florets in a savory soy-ginger sauce over brown rice.

fields.name: Spicy Chipotle Beef Burrito Bowl
fields.description: Spiced beef, black beans, corn, and salsa over cilantro-lime rice with a chipotle mayo drizzle.

fields.name: Philly Cheesesteak Bowl
fields.description: Sautéed beef strips with bell peppers, onions, and melted provolone cheese over cauliflower rice.
